snippet.title: The Sims 3 Wii Trailer
snippet.description: The Sims 3 is coming to the Wii!  Enjoy an all new beach town with new locations, new Sims to meet, new traits, careers and more.  Create unique Sims, give them personalities and control them with Karma Powers.  Get rich, get lucky, or get even with The Sims 3 for the Wii.
